Detailed Description

Offers methods to the otl connection.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExOTL::wxExOTL ( int  threaded_mode = 0)

Default constructor.

Initializes the otl connection using specified threaded mode.

Member Function Documentation

bool wxExOTL::Logon ( wxWindow *  parent,
int  max_items = 4,
const wxString &  title = _("Open ODBC Connection") 
)

Logons to the datasource (shows a connection dialog).

max_items specifies max number of datasources in the combobox and config. Returns false if dialog cancelled or logon fails.

long wxExOTL::Query ( const wxString &  query,
wxGrid *  grid,
bool &  stopped,
bool  empty_results = true,
int  buffer_size = 1024 
)

Runs the query and puts results on the grid (if the grid is shown).

If empty_results then the grid is cleared first. Returns number of rows appended.

long wxExOTL::Query ( const wxString &  query,
wxStyledTextCtrl *  stc,
bool &  stopped,
int  buffer_size = 1024 
)

Runs the query and appends results to the stc.

Returns number of lines added.
